name: CupertinoPopupSurface
desc: An iOS-style component for creating modal overlays like dialogs and action sheets.

fields.name: blurSigma
fields.desc: The strength of the gaussian blur applied to the area beneath this surface.

fields.name: isSurfacePainted
fields.desc: Whether or not to paint a translucent white on top of this surface's blurred background. [isSurfacePainted] should be true for a typical popup that contains content without any dividers. A popup that requires dividers should set [isSurfacePainted] to false and then paint its own surface area.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.

nodes.name: CupertinoPopupSurface Usage
desc: Test effect: left isSurfacePainted = false, right isSurfacePainted = true
